content: poppy poncho materials kettle tweed 2 skeins shown in poppy size us8 24 circular gauge 5 sts/inch less important since poncho is not a fitted garment cast on 94 stitches pattern row 1 knit 2 stitches *yo k2tog *repeat across the row to last 4 sts yo k2tog k2 rs row 2 purl across the row ws row 3 knit across the row row 4 knit across the row row 5 knit across the row row 6 purl across the row continue row 1 through 6 until piece measures 45 end having work row 1 bind off weave in ends and block fold piece in half ends together measure 12 inches from the ends and pin the sides for seaming to make a poncho
